instance.context:
Choice involves decision making . It can include
judging the merits of multiple options and selecting one or more of them .

flexibility of interpretation or of
options ;

state of uncertainty or perplexity especially as requiring a choice between equally unfavorable
options ;

an
option that is selected automatically unless an alternative is specified ;

a list of
options available to a computer_user ;

a menu of
options that appears below the item when the computer_user clicks on it ;

for examination ( with an
option to buy ) ;
